PROFILE.MARKER_HELP:
Drag and drop this marker to update
your position, or use the buttons
on top of the map.

ERROR.LOCALIZE_ME_FAILED: Unable to retrieve your current position

SETTINGS.ENABLE_GOOGLE_API_HELP: In the members map, allows you to display accounts with an address but without geolocation.

TIP.WOT:
This map displays profiles with a position, whether they are member accounts or not.

Only profiles with the option "appear on the map" has been activated.
TIP.WOT_BTN_LAYERS: Filter the displayed data: members, pending registrations, simple portfolios, etc.
TIP.WOT_BTN_SEARCH: You can search by name, public key, or member pseudonym.
